query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST602 ( MANDT, CS602_YEAR, CS602_TYP, CS602_DAMT, CS602_LP, CS602_CP, CS602_KEY, CS602_JAMT_O, CS602_MH, CS602_JAMT, CS602_TAMT, ERDAT, ERZZT, ERNAM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #CS602_YEAR#, #CS602_TYP#, #CS602_DAMT#, #CS602_LP#, #CS602_CP#, #CS602_KEY#, #CS602_JAMT_O#, #CS602_MH#, #CS602_JAMT#, #CS602_TAMT#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID# )
